section.title: Viewing Information on the VMDB
section.para: The Database accordion displays a summary of VMDB information, a list of all tables and indexes, settings for the tables, active client connection, and database utilization.

procedure.title: To View Information on the VMDB

step.para: Click VMDB in the tree view on the left.
Click the appropriate tab to view the desired information:

listitem.para: Summary: displays statistics about the database.
Tables: displays a clickable list of all the tables.
Indexes: displays a clickable list of all the indexes.
Settings: displays a list of all tables, their descriptions, and other valuable Information.
Client Connections: displays all current connections to the VMDB.
Utilization: displays usage charges for the disk and index nodes.
